duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage project schedules using CPM for aviation and transportation projects.
Ensure schedule compliance with relevant contract requirements.
Track and report overall project progress and critical path activities.
Identify, measure, and report the impacts of changes on a project's schedule.
Interact with clients, contractors, and stakeholders to address scheduling issues.
Assist with quality control review for schedule deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Certified Professional Engineer in the State of Texas or ability to obtain licensure within 6 months.
Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, Mechanical Engineering, Project Management, or similar field.
